Changelog
=========

0.3.0 (2007-07-19)
------------------

* support for the email API (as of zopyx.smartprintng.server>=0.4.0)


0.2.0 (2009-07-08)
------------------

* added object-oriented API


0.1.1 (2009-07-08)
------------------

* minor cleanup

0.1 (2009-07-07)
----------------

* Initial release
